about_the_game:
In Short Stories: Whispers in the Walls, step into the shoes of Homicide Detective John Palinski as he investigates a mysterious suicide in the eerie town of Serenity Springs.

Called upon by his old friend James, John uncovers unsettling truths that lead him to confront the supernatural for the first time.

As he delves deeper, he transforms from a skeptic into a believer, facing ghosts that challenge his understanding of reality.

Experience a gripping narrative filled with suspense, puzzles, and chilling encounters that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

Will you unravel the secrets hidden within the walls?

OVERVIEW

Short Stories: Whispers in the Walls, is a First-Person Atmospheric game with Suspense, and Psychological Horror-Thriller.

You will become part of a story, the story of Homicide Detective John Palinski that takes place in the 20th Century.

It is a short game the duration of it is a couple of hours as its name implies, and it is a part of a series of games called Short Stories.

Short Stories are stories that are unique, but at the same time, they are also connected, as they have references to each other.

They take place, sometimes in the same places, either in the same or different timelines, or parallel universes.

FEATURES

  • Visuals: A detailed eerie and immersive Atmospheric Environment is waiting for you to explore.

  • Psychological Experience: Short Stories Paranoia has been designed to provide a psychological horror-thriller experience.

  • Enjoyable Gameplay: Explore the Atmospheric Environment as a First-Person and interact with the items you will find along your journey while trying to survive the unknown.

  • Audio: Features an intense and immersive sound design.

  • Resolution and Graphics: Full 4K support with Nvidia DLSS and AMD FSR2 support.

  • Lore: Take part in the story, that belongs to a series called Short Stories, and learn the connections between them.

short_description: Follow in the footsteps of Detective John Palisnki, drawn to a small town after a tragic suicide. As he searches for answers, John encounters supernatural phenomena that challenge his understanding of reality. Unravel dark secrets and face your fears in a haunting atmosphere filled with mystery.
